name: Slime Munch
description:
Info

Use WASD to move. Use the Left Mouse Button to attack.

Digest your enemies. You cannot attack while digesting.

The more enemies you digest, the higher your score.

Good luck!

Made for Weekly Game Jam No.31 "Digestion"

Credits

Game by Noah Stolk and Jack Pressnell

Programming by Noah Stolk

Art and animation by Jack Pressnell

Some of these sounds were used.

Release notes

1.0.0.1 (latest)

- Fixed buttons not being visible on small screen resolutions

1.0.0.0

- Initial release
